Comment: These are the names of the migrants who have died in ICE custody during the first three months of Donald Trump's administration.  1. **Genry Ruiz Guillén**. A 29-year-old Honduran, he was admitted to the Krome center in Florida and died on January 23. 2. **Serawit Gezahegn Dejene**. The Ethiopian migrant was 45 years old when he died on January 29 in Arizona. 3. **Maksym Chernyak**. Originally from Ukraine, he was pronounced dead on February 20 after being admitted to Krome. 4. **Juan Alexis Tineo-Martinez**. The 44-year-old Dominican was taken into ICE custody in Puerto Rico following a maritime interdiction. He died on February 23. 5. **Brayan Rayo-Garzón**. The 27-year-old hanged himself in a Missouri prison. 6. **Nhon Ngoc Nguyen.** The 55-year-old Vietnamese man “died of natural causes," according to ICE, on April 16. 7. **Marie Ange Blaise.** The 44-year-old Haitian woman died on April 25 at a Florida center after complaining of chest pains.
